items.desc: Creates an iterator over the elements of the array.
Returns stable C pointer to data at certain offset, useful as a way to pass resource to C APIs.

items.text: fun ImmutableBlob.toByteArray( startIndex: Int = 0, endIndex: Int = size): ByteArray
items.desc: Copies the data from this blob into a new ByteArray.

items.text: fun ImmutableBlob.toUByteArray( startIndex: Int = 0, endIndex: Int = size): UByteArray
items.desc: Copies the data from this blob into a new UByteArray.
